mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Ann Pamela Cunningham to Nancy Halsted, 1868 November 30
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Cunningham, Ann Pamela, 1816-1875
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter from Ann Pamela Cunningham to Nancy Halsted, Vice Regent for New Jersey, November 30, 1868. Mount Vernon. Commends her endowment activities. Gift of harness used for publicity. List of "needs" and list of "comforts" for Mansion that Mrs. Eve and Mrs. Halsted will submit to New York merchants. New Jersey will furnish Lafayette room. New roof first expenditure from claim bill fund. Entertains Fort Washington's Commandant and wife. Plans opening whole Mansion to visitors on Dec. 14. Mrs. Eve will be there, and Gen. Thomas, and Marine Band, etc.
